name: RobBoberty's 3 Fragments
description:
This is my entry for the fragment jam!

It is a collection of three games I never finished because I am a lazy garbage person.

The three games and a brief description:

Galactic Destruction Clicker: You are a Galactic Warlord that wants to destroy the universe and remake it with your own designs. Basic clicker mechanics, click to do a thing a lot of times, upgrade to make it work better, repeat. It works pretty well but the balancing is bad and there's still a ton of details to iron out.

Depths of Europa: An accident left you trapped in the watery interior of Jupiter's' moon, Europa. Collect powerups to upgrade your ship and try to survive the icy depths. This one doesn't have a lot going on yet but I have a lot of storyline and gameplay plans that sound great on paper. Well, in my head mostly.

Catventure: You are a cat dreaming of adventure! It's an action/adventure game style vaguely after top-down Legend of Zelda games and similar. Lot to finish here but you can collect a few things and kill rats. 

In the process of smashing these games together into one executable I actually re-familiarized myself with how the three of them work and actually added a fair bit. So I am in a much better place to continue working on them then before I started the jam. And so I am strongly considering starting them back up, if you liked any of them and would like to see it continued please let me know!

(There's a dumb easter egg in the game selection screen)
